title: Windows 8.1 pro 64 bit pre activated final
description:
Windows 8.1 X64/64Bit Pro Activated Final
BUILD: 6.3.9600.16384.WINBLUE
KMSpico KMSpico v9.1.3 Final

Instructions:
1) Burn to DVD or install from a flash drive(4.0GB+)(tool provided).
2) Boot from DVD or flash drive.
4) Make sure u have the install key written down somewhere for installation.
3) Follow installation menu to your preference and use the CD key that is provided to continue the installation (XHQ8N-C3MCJ-RQXB6-WCHYG-C9WKB)
4) Wait till installation is finished and enjoy your ACTIVATED WIN 8.1 PRO.
5) Once windows has finshed installing and you install an antivirus make an exceptions to Directory %ProgramFiles%KMSpico* in Antivirus or Defender.

For example: If u r using avast anti virus,go to settings,select antivirus,then scroll down to exclusions,select browse,then select the checkbox for KMSpico folder in C:/Program Files/KMSpico........

Dual boot is possible....
Automatic updates will work....
This version won't expire since activation is done automatically offline.....
Be sure to update ur graphics driver after the windows installation to play the latest games....
hard format is recommended but u can install it over another os(dual boot)...

Note: If u r upgrading ur OS from a 32 bit OS,the setup won't start by simply running it frm a dvd or usb....
Back up ur important data and then format ur system and perform the windows 8.1 installation
OR
reboot ur system,press F8 key until u see the boot from CD/DVD option,select it and then windows 8.1 setup interface will appear,folow the instruction......

**Plz make sure u have a x64/64 bit system.....

Enjoy ur activated 8.1 pro........
and SEED...........
